text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/33afa2447bdb0bdd15253c69a2cf6f9903685815|patch 8.2.1320: Vim9: cannot declare some single letter variables>
patch 8.2.1320: Vim9: cannot declare some single letter variables

Problem:    Vim9: cannot declare some single letter variables.
Solution:   Do not recognize a colon for a namespace for single letter
            variables. (closes #6547)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1320: Vim9: cannot declare some single letter variables · vim/vim@33afa24
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1320: Vim9: cannot declare some single letter variables · vim/vim@33afa24
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: cannot declare some single letter variables. Solution: Do not recognize a colon for a namespace for single letter variables. (closes #6547)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/7b7f78f51dc5a2c307330af0d4e53faced34726f|patch 8.2.1321: GitHub CI also runs on tag push>
patch 8.2.1321: GitHub CI also runs on tag push

Problem:    GitHub CI also runs on tag push.
Solution:   Skip CI on push. (Ken Takata, closes #6571)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1321: GitHub CI also runs on tag push · vim/vim@7b7f78f
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1321: GitHub CI also runs on tag push · vim/vim@7b7f78f
attachments.text: Problem: GitHub CI also runs on tag push. Solution: Skip CI on push. (Ken Takata, closes #6571)

patch 8.2.1322: Vim9: method on double quoted string doesn't work

Problem:    Vim9: method on double quoted string doesn't work.
Solution:   Recognize double quoted string. (closes #6562)

attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: method on double quoted string doesn't work. Solution: Recognize double quoted string. (closes #6562)

text:

patch 8.2.1323: Vim9: invalid operators only rejected in :def function

Problem:    Vim9: invalid operators only rejected in :def function.
Solution:   Also reject them at script level. (closes #6564)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1323: Vim9: invalid operators only rejected in :def function · vim/vim@696ba23
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1323: Vim9: invalid operators only rejected in :def function · vim/vim@696ba23
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: invalid operators only rejected in :def function. Solution: Also reject them at script level. (closes #6564)

patch 8.2.1324: Vim9: line break after "=" does not work

Problem:    Vim9: line break after "=" does not work.
Solution:   Also allow for NUL after "=". (closes #6549)
